SPCode needs Java to decompile plugins, but it couldn't get it to work properly, perhaps due to an absent or incorrect Java installation. Do you wish to download and install it now?
Java version found is outdated
SPCode requires Java 11 SDK or later to decompile plugins, but an outdated version was found. Do you wish to download and upgrade it now?"
failed to decompile Downloading Java Fetching installation file from https://adoptopenjdk.net... completed downloaded Java installation file opened After installing Java, it is highly recommended to restart SPCode.
